1543720.name: Sunrise Tragedy
1543720.description:
All life outside of one cathedral has perished. Inside that cathedral resides the last remnants of humanity, where humans live under vampire rule. Monsters scour for blood in every corner of the cathedral, and with the onset of giant monsters called goliaths, humanity's hope for survival has completely dissipated.

However, while the future looks bleak, perhaps humanity can accomplish something grand in its final days before extinction. Play as a young woman named Aeryn, a talented monster killer from the Human Quarters, who may be able to do something extraordinary for a dying world.

Inspired by Bloodborne, the Dark Souls trilogy and the Castlevania series, Sunrise Tragedy offers a new take on the 2D soulslike genre. In this game, you will explore a monster-ridden cathedral full of interconnected intricate level design. Engage in visceral combat where each enemy encounter is a thrilling duel to the death. As you traverse this world of horrors, gain new abilities by defeating bosses to aid you in combat and exploration.

This game offers quite a bit of combat depth. You are encouraged to learn how to pressure your enemies, which will make it easier to inflict stagger. Once they stagger, you will have a brief moment to inflict some major damage. However, this is not the only way to play. In this game, there is a large emphasis on build customization, giving you the freedom to form your own playstyle with a large catalogue of weapons, spells and accessories.

This game offers a new rendition of the traditional "estus flask" healing mechanic of the soulslike genre with its elaborate alchemy system. Throughout your journey, you will collect many ingredients which you can put in your potions to give them new effects. For example, a magic build may want to include some MP-restoring ingredients, or in some areas you may want to include a cure for poison. Ingredients are reusable and permanently in your inventory once obtained, so you are free to experiment as much as you like.

On your journey, you will encounter many whimsical characters. These characters may offer new skills or allow you to buy from their shops. You may also form bonds with them to learn of the horrors of their pasts, and hear their philosophies amid the impending apocalypse.

  • Interconnected world full of intricate level design

  • Intense action combat against formidable enemies and menacing bosses

  • Wide variety of weapons, spells and accessories to customize your build

  • Alchemy system that allows for lots of creativity

  • A dark, horror narrative about humanity wallowing in its final days

  • Many compelling characters to bond with
